basics.name: Alexander Williams
basics.label: PhD Researcher in AI and Music
basics.summary: AI and Music researcher by day; Electronic music producer and DJ by night.

location.address: Centre for Digital Music, Queen Mary University of London

work.name: Mariposa AI
work.summary: Mariposa is a start-up developing an AI-assisted slow-dating app that provides a new first date each week. AS well as serving as director, I was responsible for the research and implementation of AI functionality within the app.

work.name: ASTUTE 2020 (Advanced Sustainable Manufacturing Technologies), Swansea University
work.summary: Working to deliver industry-academia collaborative research projects within the remit of Industry 4.0 with expertise in AI, robotics and automation systems, Internet of Things (IoT), optimisation algorithms, sensors (including computer vision), and more

work.name: Malinko
work.summary: Responsible for research and implementing advanced genetic algorithm techniques for improving Malinko's highly constrained healthcare scheduling algorithm.

volunteer.summary: Yard Yard is a transient DIY events space hosting live music, workshops, artist showcases, and more.
Helped keep the conference running smoothly by assisting guests, speakers and organisers with whatever was needed.
Presented a weekly radio show called Zinger Nation consisting of 1 hour DJ mixes from myself and guests.

Music Editor for two years, presenter for two years, writer for three years. Organising opportunities for reviewers, writing articles for the radio blog, reviewing the articles of others, presenting a radio show.

Founded the DJ society alonside others at University of Liverpool. Worked to get the society off the ground by fundraising, recruiting members, organising events such as open decks, tutorials, and socials.

courses: Deep Learning for Music and Audio
Principles of C and Memory Management
